news.title: Powerful, Configurable, Secure: MetaMask is How You Show Up in Web3
news.subtitle: No matter who you are or how you use web3, MetaMask allows you to do more safely on the decentralized internet

image.title: Powerful, Configurable, Secure: MetaMask is How You Show Up in Web3 Image

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Web3 is catalyzing global change and as a MetaMask user, you're leading the charge. You are a trendsetter, trailblazer, creator, and builder, defining and shaping the culture and the systems that will define the next age of the decentralized internet.

Over the years, we’ve built MetaMask to be a wallet without limits, designed for anyone who wants to do more with their crypto, engage with more dapps, and do it more safely. With MetaMask, there are no dead ends, no corner of web3 you can't explore, no dapp you can't connect with. And thanks to its best-in-class security, infinite extensibility, and powerful aggregation and curation in Portfolio, there's never been a better time for you to do more with MetaMask.

Let’s explore further.

MetaMask Makes You More Powerful in Web3

MetaMask is your gateway to the decentralized web, offering unmatched connectivity to thousands of dapps across networks and devices. It enables users to self-custody their assets, securely manage their digital authority and confidently sign transactions on the web, on the go or natively in a dapp.

MetaMask also brings the best of web3 to you. Instead of building “one size fits all” tools, we aggregate the best web3 bridges, DEXs, onramp providers and staking protocols so you can choose the best tool for the job and manage your assets, without ever leaving the wallet.

Users can effortlessly buy, sell, swap, send, trade and stake tokens, knowing they’re getting the best rates from dozens of trusted providers.

Configurability, Privacy, and Extensibility: More Control with MetaMask

MetaMask is also pushing the boundaries of user control, offering unmatched configurability. We didn’t build a “take it or leave it” wallet, instead shaping MetaMask as a customizable extension of you. MetaMask, allows users to set the terms for how applications can interact with their self-custodied data and digital assets.

Nowhere is this configurability more important than with our privacy features that allow users to control even the most basic functionality of the MetaMask wallet - from RPC configuration and token management to custom security warnings and IP tracking. The default settings built into MetaMask to protect users are all configurable, because there is no one size fits all approach to privacy.

Customize your privacy settings:

Extend to any network:

Set your terms:

Configurability is not limited to just what the MetaMask team has built. With MetaMask Snaps, users can tailor their experience, extend MetaMask to new networks and even build their own extensions and customizations, without permission - that's permissionless innovation.

Do Everything in Web3 More Securely with MetaMask

None of this matters if users do not feel secure exploring the frontiers of web3. MetaMask is committed to security and has become the battle-tested wallet trusted by millions of users executing their largest and most sensitive transactions.

We have powered billions of transactions across thousands of networks and scores of dapps, without security incidents caused by MetaMask and offer support to our customers 24/7 to ensure they safely navigate web3.

We are constantly investing in security, striking new partnerships like Blockaid's transaction security, adding new capabilities through the team at Wallet Guard, enabling users to build a modular wallet through Snaps and even building runtime protection through our Lavamoat security kernel. And with an open-source codebase and a transparent approach to privacy, you know exactly what you’re using with MetaMask.

MetaMask, an Extension of You in Web3 Now and Always

As the momentum of regulatory clarity and mainstream interest spurs innovation in our space, MetaMask will continue to be the powerful, configurable, secure wallet for those building and exploring the frontiers of the decentralized internet.

With powerful aggregators that put the best of tools in crypto at your fingertips and configurable settings that put you in control of your assets, data and digital authority, and a steadfast commitment to security and privacy preservation - MetaMask enables you to do more, safely, in web3.

And we’re just getting started.

This post is directed only at persons outside the UK and should not be acted on by UK consumers.

nodes.title: Introducing MetaMask Signature Insights Snaps
nodes.subtitle: A new way to stay protected with community-powered tools.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Safety is paramount in today's digital world — especially in web3, where users frequently interact with decentralized applications and manage valuable assets. A common vulnerability in the ecosystem is malicious signature requests, which lead unsuspecting users to authorize transactions that compromise their assets. This can happen by tricking people into signing something that allows a nefarious actor to transfer a users’ assets.

To address this critical safety issue, MetaMask has introduced Signature Insight Snaps, a new category of security tools built by third-party developers. These Snaps empower users with greater transparency and control over signature requests, helping to identify and avoid potential threats.

Signature Insight Snaps integrate seamlessly with MetaMask. These tools work by analyzing the contents of requests, giving users insights into the signature’s purpose and potential risks. Leveraging knowledge from Signature Insight Snaps allows users to make more informed decisions, reducing the likelihood of falling victim to phishing attempts, unauthorized access, or other malicious activities. The added layer of security reinforces users' trust, and also fosters a safer environment for web3 interactions.

Discover our first Signature Insights Snaps

Kleros Scout is the first Snap to support Signature Insights. It decodes the content of signature requests, and identifies the addresses of any contracts you may be authorizing in the signature via Kleros’s decentralized token curated registries. It can then warn you if the contract you are interacting with is malicious.

Above, the Kleros Scout insight is displayed in the new signature request design. The insight shows that the contract being authorized by this signature request is the official Seaport 1.6 contract for NFT trading deployed by OpenSea.

ZyFi Paymaster Insights is our second Signature Insight Snap to launch. It improves the readability of signing transactions in the zkSync ecosystem, especially for paymaster-related transactions using txType 113. ZyFi Paymaster Insights adds helpful information about the “from” and “to” addresses for these paymaster-related transactions. Additionally, it provides extra information related to the paymaster, such as the address, type, gas fee token address, and gas fee token amount. This gives users more clarity on what they’re signing, helping them to avoid potentially malicious signatures.

Above, the ZyFi Paymaster Insight shows the from address, to address, and the paymaster type of the signature request on zkSync.

Install Kleros Scout Snap and ZyFi Paymaster Insights from the MetaMask Snaps Directory in MetaMask Extension 12.4.2 or later.

Build your own

Visit the MetaMask Developer Documentation to learn how you can build your own Signature Insight Snaps, and sign-up for our Builder Engagement Program so we can support you on your developer journey.

In the future, Signature Insights Snaps will be able to hook into alerts in signature requests. MetaMask will also offer more types of insights including information about origin URL of any request.

Head to the MetaMask Snaps Directory to discover security Snaps that will keep you safe in your web3 journey.

nodes.title: Making DeFi onboarding safer with MoonPay
nodes.subtitle: Meet the builders who are transforming web3, in our More With MetaMask Partner Series.

image.title: More secure with MetaMask and MoonPay
image.description: Making DeFi onboarding more secure with MetaMask and MoonPay.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
MetaMask is the gateway to the decentralized web, enabling you to do more. Users can connect to any dapp, on any network, from any device. From DeFi to DeSci, gaming to NFTs, and beyond: MetaMask is deeply passionate about the web3 community. The More With MetaMask Partner Series shines a light on builders who are innovating across web3. Next up, MoonPay.

MoonPay is a leading crypto company that lets users buy and sell digital assets directly with their MetaMask wallet. Since MoonPay’s partnership with MetaMask began in 2022, we’ve been dedicated to simplifying the management of cryptocurrencies, while keeping users secure. Let’s dive into the ways our collaboration achieves this.

Streamlining DeFi onboarding

As the demand for self-custodial wallets has risen, so too has the need for robust and intuitive tools that give users a frictionless “web2-like” experience. In the past, the two haven’t always mixed well. Newcomers to crypto, who typically have the highest appetite for intuitive UX, tend to find DeFi overly complex.

Recognizing this tension, MoonPay saw an opportunity to bridge-the-gap by providing seamless cash-to-crypto onboarding to the world’s leading self-custodial wallet, MetaMask. Integrating with MoonPay allowed MetaMask’s millions of users to interface with DeFi through familiar payment options like credit cards, debit cards, Apple Pay, and Google Pay. It also allowed MetaMask users to benefit from MoonPay’s stringent security protocols.

Simplifying ramps to protect users

One of the key advantages of the integration is that users can purchase digital assets directly within MetaMask wallet — eliminating the need to navigate multiple platforms. This approach smoothes out the process, while keeping users’ information safe. By avoiding unnecessary third-party platforms, data exposure is minimized.

In addition to decreasing exposure by helping users stay within the platform, MoonPay is committed to protection and security in various ways:

  • Our ramps are built with advanced encryption technology like AES-256.
  • We comply with PCI-DSS Level 1, ISO 27001, and ISO 27018 standards, ensuring we meet stringent data security criteria.
  • Our systems have undergone independent audits for PCI-DSS Level 1, ISO 27001/27018, and SOC2 Type 2 certifications, giving users peace of mind that our safety standards don’t waver.
  • Our rigorous Anti-Money Laundering and Know Your Customer policies helps prevent bad actors from entering our ecosystem.

Creating a more secure web3

As we continue to work alongside MetaMask, our shared focus on safe, user-friendly solutions remains a cornerstone of this partnership. Together, we’re not only simplifying crypto onboarding for newcomers – we’re setting the bar for what it means to prioritize security in web3.

Buying and selling crypto with your MetaMask wallet via MoonPay has never been easier. It’s easy, fast, and safe. Get started today.

nodes.title: MetaMask ile nakit para için kripto nasıl satılır?
nodes.subtitle: MetaMask Portfolio'nun Sat özelliği, birkaç tıkla araştırılmış sağlayıcılar aracılığıyla nakit para için kripto satmanıza olanak sağlar.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
MetaMask Portfolio'nun Sat özelliği kripto varlıklarınızı kolayca itibari paraya (USD, EUR, GBP) çevirebilmenize olanak sağlar. Al özelliği ile bir araya geldiğinde, daha az aracıyla ve banka hesabınız veya PayPal bakiyeniz gibi doğrudan sizin tercih ettiğiniz ödeme noktasına__ daha hızlı itibari para dönüştürme işlemleriyle kendine yeten bir web3 deneyiminiz olmasını sağlar.


Araştırılmış kripto sağlayıcıları


MetaMask, tek bir sağlayıcıyla sınırlanmak yerine çeşitli araştırılmış sağlayıcıları bir araya getirir (bunların çoğu Al iş akışındadır) size Ethereum Ana Ağında tercih ettiğiniz itibari paraya (varsa) ETH dönüştürme konusunda farklı gerçek zamanlı seçenekler sunmak amacıyla —yüksek standartlarımızı karşıladıklarından emin oluruz.—

Küresel bir hedef kitle


Sat özelliği şu anda ABD * (eyalet kısıtlamaları uygulanır)*, Birleşik Krallık ve Avrupa'nın bazı kısımlarında mevcut olup dünya çapında topluluğumuza sunmak için daha fazla bölgeye genişleme planlarımız mevcuttur. Kullanıcıların kriptoya özgürce giriş ve çıkış yapmalarının bir yolunu sağlamak önemlidir ve bu seçeneklerin web3'ü daha fazla kişi için ulaşılabilir yapacağını umuyoruz. Başlangıç olarak Ethereum Ana Ağında ETH'yi destekliyoruz ve yakında aşama 2 ağlarında yerli gaz token'lerine ve USD, EUR ve GBP itibari paralarına genişleme planlarımız mevcuttur.

MetaMask Portfolio'da Kripto Sat özelliği nasıl kullanılır?


Nakit para için kriptonuzu satmak üzere:

  1. MetaMask cüzdanınızı portfolio.metamask.io adresine bağlayın
  2. Başlamak için “Sat” sekmesine tıklayın
  3. Bölgenizi seçin
  4. Satış yapmak istediğiniz kripto token'ini ve ağını seçin (örnek: Ethereum üzerinde ETH)
  5. Konumunuzda mevcut olan itibari para hesap hedefini (ör: banka hesabı veya PayPal bakiyesi) seçin
  6. Satmak istediğiniz kripto tutarını girin (örnek: 0,5 ETH)
  7. Mevcut farklı sağlayıcılardan alınan tüm teklifler gerçek zamanlı olarak sunulacaktır. Devam etmek için bir teklifi seçin.
  8. Kaydolmak ve itibari para hesabınızı bağlamak için güvenli bir şekilde sağlayıcının web sitesine yönlendirileceksiniz ve ardından tekrar MetaMask Portfolio'ya geri döneceksiniz.
  9. Cüzdanınızdan itibari para hesabınıza kripto göndermek için “Şuraya ETH Gönder: [Sağlayıcı]” seçeneğini seçin.
  10. MetaMask cüzdanınızda işlemi onaylayın.
  11. Gerçekleşmesi sırasında emrinizi “Sat” sekmesinde takip edebileceksiniz. Saatler sağlayıcıya göre değişiklik gösterebilir ve paranın itibari para hesabınıza yansıması birkaç gün sürebilir.

Başarılı! 🦊

Sağlayıcılarla uyumlu


MetaMask Portfolio'da Al ve Sat özelliklerini kullanmanız pek çok aynı sağlayıcı ile kripto ve itibari para yolculuğunuzda ilerleyip aynı yere gelmenize olanak sağlar. Bu da belirli bir sağlayıcıya yalnızca bir defa kaydolmanız ve banka hesabınızı bağlamanız gerektiği anlamına gelir. Bu özellikleri kullanmaktan keyif alacağınızı umuyoruz.

Başlamaya hazır mısınız? metamask.io/portfolio/ adresinden daha fazla bilgi edinin.

MetaMask Portfolio: web3 ile ilgili her şeyinizi takip edin ve yönetin

MetaMask Portfolio, web3 ihtiyaçlarınızı temin etmek ve kontrolü size vermek için kapsamlı ve kullanıcı dostu bir platform sunar. Kontrol Paneli, Al, Swap, Köprü ve Stake ile güvencedesiz. Merkeziyetsiz uygulamayı anlamlı güncellemelerle iyileştirmek ve geliştirmek için sürekli olarak çalışıyoruz. MetaMask Portfolio ve özellikleri hakkında daha fazla bilgi edinmek için buraya tıklayın.
